item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: BarCounter Privacy Policy Yuta Urushiyama (the developer) built the BarCounter app (the app) as a Commercial app. The app is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use the app. If you choose to use the app, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.
